parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The detachment of the propane hose can cause a gas leak, leading to a fire hazard, and potentially resulting in injuries or property damage.
symptoms: The propane hose detaches from the RV
often without warning
and may not be noticed until the vehicle reaches its destination.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the awning system can cause the awning to extend abruptly, potentially striking individuals nearby, and may prevent the awning from closing, leaving it exposed to the elements.
symptoms: The canvas separates from the RV
causing the awning to extend suddenly
and may prevent the awning from closing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Delays in receiving recall repair parts can leave vehicles in an unsafe condition, potentially leading to accidents or injuries, and can cause frustration and inconvenience for vehicle owners.
symptoms: Vehicle owners receive notification of a recall but are unable to have the repair completed due to parts availability issues
and may experience delays or lack of communication from dealerships or manufacturers.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Adhesive Bond Failure in Frameless Windows
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the adhesive bond in frameless windows can cause the window to detach and shatter, potentially putting others in danger and causing damage to the vehicle.
symptoms: The window detaches and flaps freely on the hinged upper bar
the window hinges upwards and shatters into multiple pieces against the side of the vehicle
large pieces of glass fall from the vehicle.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Receiving incorrect recall notifications can cause confusion and inconvenience to vehicle owners.
symptoms: Receiving recall notifications for a vehicle that is not owned
receiving threatening letters from NHTSA.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Loose Undercarriage Bolts in RV Trailers
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: Loose undercarriage bolts can cause the RV box to come loose or fall off the frame of the trailer, leading to potential injury or death to motorists.
symptoms: Loose bolts that mount the RV box to the frame of the trailer
RV box could come loose or fall off the frame of the trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Waaree solar controller can cause overcharging of the lead acid batteries, leading to potential electrical system failures, fires, or damage to the batteries.
symptoms: Overcharging of lead acid batteries
batteries reaching voltages above 20.9 volts
electrical system failures
generator surging.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The electrical system failure can cause the generator to surge, leading to potential electrical shocks, fires, or damage to the electrical system.
symptoms: Generator surging
inability to hold a charge
blockage in the electric line.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Castle Rock Tire Sidewall Bubble Defect
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The presence of bubbles on the sidewall of Castle Rock tires can lead to catastrophic tire failure, resulting in loss of control, accidents, and potential harm to occupants or other road users.
symptoms: Visible bubbles on the sidewall of the tire
often facing inward or under the trailer
which can lead to sudden tire blowout
loss of tire pressure
and damage to the vehicle or trailer.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Frame Weld Failure and Structural Integrity Issues
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of frame welds can lead to a compromised structural integrity of the vehicle, causing the suspension to malfunction, and potentially leading to loss of control, accidents, or injuries.
symptoms: Broken welds on the frame
axle supports
and body support brackets
twisted frame
suspension malfunction
uneven tire wear
unusual noises or vibrations while driving.
